website_summaries.verdict: Professional-grade spray that effectively kills wasps and keeps them away.
pros: Makes up to 32 gallons of spray, so the bottle lasts a long time
Protects against wasps for a long time after spraying
Does not go into water supplies
cons: Has a strong smell and doesn't kill wasps immediately

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Havent seen a spider, ant,roach,mouse, etc..since spraying this 3 months ago. Sprayed it on my wife and it did nothing but piss her off. Works on bugs though. Worth the money for sure. Spiders are not welcome in my home!!! Yucky!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was an "inspector", or first guy out, for a major pest control company. I've had lots of experience with all types of pest control chemicals. This is, by far, one of the top non-micro encapsulated products on the market. In fact, this is the chemical I choose to use on the exterior of my own homes. Sometimes I apply micro encapsulated products... but this is my "go to" product for a monthly application. Actually... you can get results far longer ham a month(depending on weather) with this product. For the price... this is a fantastic option! Just remember to change up you chemical active ingredients at times. You don't want your insects developing a resistance to any chemical.
customer_reviews.author: Infandous Ktenology

customer_reviews.title: We have been fighting fleas so bad since last summer
customer_reviews.text: We have been fighting fleas so bad since last summer. I have treated and retreated and retreated our yard. To NO avail, the fleas just won't die. I purchased this stuff based on a recommendation from someone at a local feed store. All I can say is that Demon is a Demon!!!!!!!! I have only treated the yard once, and will repeat this weekend just to be sure we got them all. The fleas are finally dissipating!!!!! I have recommended this to others, and will continue to purchase this for flea treatment in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for homeowners
customer_reviews.text: Last a while. Not instant death for insects like I thought it would be. However it does kill everything, just give it a day or so and you'll be able to see all kinds of dead bugs. I spray once a month and it does great. I use 1.5 ounces to a gallon of water. I use a cheap 1 gallon pump sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Plow9

customer_reviews.title: Roachpocalypse
customer_reviews.text: I bought a house that was vacant 6 months. Thanks to this pesticide, the Roachpocalypse has begun. The day after I sprayed, no fewer than 200 dead roaches were carried to their deaths in a dust pan. I am not only impressed, I am astounded! My house belongs to me again. Highly recommend! 1 gallon of water per 1.3oz, so this product will last me a year, maybe two!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rayne

customer_reviews.title: Works but only for a few days as a barrier insecticide
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by professional exterminator. Smells bad but works well on German roaches. Kills all roaches that pass by it for about 3 days, but is pretty ineffective after that period. Found that avion professional baits worked much better in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the real deal. Kills everything. This Black Widow was one of the casualties.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Best pest control product
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this stuff a few years ago when we moved to Texas by a friend who owns a ranch. I was trying to get rid of the normal pests, ants, roaches and such. He used it to control not only those, but also small rodents, mice, rats, gophers, possums etc. So be advised, this stuff WILL KILL small pet animals like cats and small dogs. I DO USE IT INDOORS around baseboards, in cupboards, under the stove and dishwasher, but not around the cat tree. If used correctly and per the instructions it is safe to use around indoor pets. 8 years now I gave been using this with no adverse effects on the cat or dog.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cross

customer_reviews.title: Kills Lantern Flies
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this at work on the perimeter of the buildings and the roof line to kill lantern flies. In eastern PA they are getting really really bad and this seems to be effective. They keep dying in areas that have been sprayed and it has been 3 weeks since the first application.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Using Demon Completely Changed my Effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: I've been vocally shaming the bugs via condescending observations on their appearance, yet they seem not to mind and seemingly move in more of their friends. I've recently added Demon Max to this routine and it seems to be 100% more effective. How about that.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: DDT!
customer_reviews.text: After checking over the ingredients, I found that this product is basically a diluted DDT formula. Very effective, but be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter#1

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: The hubs and I got a great deal on a home that needed lots of TLC. Great location and very good purchase. Problem with bugs was expected. We tried all the standard sprays/powders but wasn’t able to beat the roaches or Spiders. Found this on Amazon and read good things. Needless to say this is my second purchase and this stuff ROCKS!!! It works better than anything I’ve ever tried! We spray both inside and outside and are completely and utterly impressed. Spiders and roaches gone!
customer_reviews.author: NeverSayNever

customer_reviews.title: ITS WORKING!!! Sprayed once and have seen no roaches
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this once under my kitchen cabinets and have not seen a roach since! Terminix came out 3 times and I have seen roaches afterwards! but not now that I sprayed this stuff! I also have those plug in radio waves things in my kitchen going on. The roaches are living in the cracks of the cabinets by my dishwasher and have not been seen since. This is a good deal for the amount of money spent on this and terminix. I have more spray left. I can spray once a week if I want too. I have the German roaches
customer_reviews.author: Zebrababy

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye wasps
customer_reviews.text: I have an overhang that is rotting away due to shoddy gutters and wasps were starting to move in. I sprayed this and they haven't been back since. I also sprayed the entire bottom of my deck and stairs because we had a hornet nest under there last year. I have yet to find a single hornet even interested in going under my desk now, so this has been a remarkable success even though it's been a rainy month.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H.

customer_reviews.title: Demon works! Best Product on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Demon works for the pests in Las Vegas. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! I spray my patio, shrubs outside front door and inside perimeter too. If I see any bugs which are water bugs or German roaches they are DEAD! Then all I do is sweep them up which is great! Before someone told me about Demon I was finding bugs anywhere and everywhere inside and outside. This definitely is a barrier product when breached kills the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaknows

customer_reviews.title: Great D.I.Y. pesticide !
customer_reviews.text: I am my own Exterminator ! Awesome stuff , makes 16 gallons of maximum strength pesticide. Live in Coastal S.C. , where basically it's a tropical environment. Keeps the creepy crawlies out and dead ! Also saves me $350 a year from a Pesticide company !
customer_reviews.author: Garvin Scott Bridges

customer_reviews.title: DID KILL ROACHES, BUT ROACHES KEPT COMING.. ...
customer_reviews.text: DID KILL ROACHES, BUT ROACHES KEPT COMING....CANT STOP ROACHES EVEN WITH A NUCLEAR BOMB.... I STILL USE THE PRODUCT AND WOULD BUY AGAIN...
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Best for killing thousand leggers & spiders
customer_reviews.text: My uncle told me about this stuff years ago. I live in a home that has somewhat of a wooded area around it. I kept finding huge m&m sized black spiders lurking around. I've been spraying the perimeter of my home with Ortho Home Defense from Home Depot for ants, flies & stink bugs, but it wouldn't do a thing for the spiders. So I started using this stuff. I spray outside 3 feet up and down around the perimeter of my home, then on the ground floor I spray the perimeter of my home and the perimeter of each room. Works for I'd say about 7-8 months, then we have to spray again.
customer_reviews.author: WDC

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far, seeing dead bugs
customer_reviews.text: Here in our lovely desert, the temps are heating-up and our little desert critters are startin' to creep. I've had a pro pest control company for years--but they raise prices and sometimes did little more than spray the garage! The Demon Max chemical, is the exact same pesticide my pro pest company switched to as an environmental protection matter. So potent--this formulation (1 oz. per gallon or 2 Tbls), probably will need to be increased in my area as high temps tend to increase certain activity, but we'll see. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great bug control
customer_reviews.text: Works great on roaches, spiders, ants even scorpions! I love this product. I cleaned my house daily but still had critter problems so I used this and it worked for about 4 months straight I didn't have really any critters coming in. I bought a gallon spray can then added 1 gallon of water with 2 tablespoons of the liquid, I sprayed weekly the first 2 weeks then once a month afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Shanietria Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Death to all roaches!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my old neighbors (meth heads) moved out of the house next door and trashed the place. It got foreclosed on and someone bought it and remodeled it. Which caused all the roaches to come to my house. I sprayed inside my garage and around my house. The next morning I woke up and looked in my garage and there were TONS of dead/dying roaches. I found dead roaches on my porch a few days later. I haven’t seen a single live roach since I sprayed and that has been over 3 weeks. I should let you know I also used roach bait as well.
customer_reviews.author: You Wish

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF WORKS IF YOU WANT TO GET RID OF BUGS.
customer_reviews.text: I was given half a bottle of this a few years back, we had built a home in a heavily wooded area with a pond on two sides. We immediately started having ants and winged termites entering our newly built home. I used this and they totally went away. We use it two or three times a year whenever we see ANY bugs and this runs them out. We go around the house at the bottom,and our porch. It works on ants, termites, wolf spiders and those brown lady looking bugs for sure. This is our first replacement bottle we bought since we used all the other. THIS STUFF WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye mosquitoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with how this worked so quickly. I sprayed my front yard and part of the back (it got too dark to finish) and not one single mosquito showed up when I sat out on my front porch about an hour later! I saw a ton of mosquitoes fly out of the bushes when I sprayed them, so make sure you spray those! Going to spray under my shutters and in corners where wasps like to nest today. I'm very pleased so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used this to get rid of the thousands of boxelder ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this to get rid of the thousands of boxelder bogs that hung around my house. After spraying around the exterior of the house and around the outside of the window sills, 95% of the bugs were gone/dead within a day. A few lingered around for a couple days after, but they completely dissapeared after that. It's been about 2 weeks since application and still no bugs. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris Licciardi

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome. When we spray around the house
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. When we spray around the house, need to keep the dogs indoors for a few hours. I am on my second bottle. I have been using this Demon Max Insecticide for a few years now. No complaints yet. It does the job . Also delivered in a timely manner too.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: FIRE ANTS BEWARE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff took care of my fire ant problem! LOVE IT!!!!! Live in the heart of Texas - i guess this is FIRE ANT COUNTRY! tried all kinds of granules, stakes, sprays - if the fire ants even recognized the treatment - they would just move to another spot in the yard. I sprayed them with the concentration on the bottle as directed and they are OUT OF THERE! I also sprayed around the house;
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: Summer is here and we worried about roaches coming into our house. This product needs dilution with water. So I also purchased spray bottle. You can use this for several times. This is very toxic if you inhale or gets onto your skin. My husband wore mask, goggle and long sleeves. He sprayed around the outside of our house. And few hours later, we found 3 roaches dead! Definitely works! We are planning to do this one more time about month later.
customer_reviews.author: BO R.

customer_reviews.title: Bug better then be gone
customer_reviews.text: I use this round the house every three months but it has lasted keeping bugs away for as long is eight months for me. This is the only bug control I use, very happy. Would I buy it again? Absolutely yes and I do on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Works on Stink Bugs
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works where others fail. Had a major issue with stink bug in the Fall just covering the house. They look for every nook and cranny to enter the house in the fall, including attic vents. Sprayed some of this on the house, particularly areas where they could enter the house, perimeter and attic vents. Used an inexpensive pump sprayer to mix it in. Definitely want to use a mask when spraying. Stink bugs walk on it a bit and then fall off dead. Almost eliminated having stink bugs that entered the attic and the house.
customer_reviews.author: Clasical Affectionado

customer_reviews.title: Boom. DEAD!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff is great. I had spiders in garage and bees in wall of shed. Both gone. I HATED to kill the bees but the lawn man is a wimp. lol
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W.

customer_reviews.title: Dwmon Max Works
customer_reviews.text: Demon Max works very well at killing all the insects around my house including spiders, and fleas. A professional pest control person recommended it to me and I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Robbins

customer_reviews.title: How to Use the Measuring Cup
customer_reviews.text: I read the front, back, and everything in the attached booklet, and saw no instructions on how to fill the .5 oz./1 oz. attached measuring cup. I shook the bottle up and down, sideways, and every which way possible. Finally, I figured it out: you hold the bottle upright and squeeze the bottle. The liquid will run up the narrow tube into the little measuring cup. I don't know why the manufacturer didn't put this instruction on the front or back labels. I will update on how well the product works in a couple of weeks. In the meantime, I wanted to let others know how to fill the little measuring cup.
customer_reviews.author: jderrico

customer_reviews.title: This really works. Last forever when mixed correctly and ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works. Last forever when mixed correctly and problem gone.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Boles

customer_reviews.title: Will kill em.must buy
customer_reviews.text: Had plumbing issues awhile back then roaches came after.i used boric acid before worked very well but they came back. They invaded everywhere and every room. Even my microwave and new fridge! Wasn't having that. Bought this and went to town. It's been two to three weeks and have seen such a improvement almost all are gone! Even the spiders and flies are gone from outside my door!!! Spraying further out on my lawn for the holiday the fourth. I bought a small spray bottle for the house and spray .love this......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more exterminator fees.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It's knocking my roaches out as we speak. Very well worth the price. Saw results in a matter of 1 hour . Bugs are still being found dead 10 hours later #1 in my book. Will never have to pay an exterminator again. Excellent product. Thanks Amazon and manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for managing roaches.
customer_reviews.text: We live near a run off creek and have had an issue with various critters since moving into the house this past year. I tried several treatments but they didn't seem to work for the Palmetto bugs and German roaches. This stuff worked great and has continued being effective during the last 2-3 months. I sprayed our attic, fireplace, windows, doorways and around the house in various stages over the course of a long weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Not so great as a barrier
customer_reviews.text: Seems to kill most insects within a few days. Good on spiders, which are tough to kill. After a week I began to notice the return of the hardy insects like spiders, scorpions, and centipedes. For outside use, after a month it was pretty much ineffective for everything. Messy and stinky to use and cleanup is a pain. Safety warnings are pretty scary if anyone bothers to read them. I found Cy-kick to last longer outdoors, but weather conditions might be a controlling factor.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Strong Insecticide.
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep most insects at bay. Worked better than most products I have tried. Must be careful where you use it. Read instructions very carefully. We live in Florida and used it around the outside perimeter of our home and along our lanai.
customer_reviews.author: pf

customer_reviews.title: kills em
customer_reviews.text: Demon max kills bugs better than Raid or the other insecticides available at the store. The ones I was dealing with (german cockroaches) have left the area or died. It does smell bad but that I can live with if it does what it's supposed to do. You do have to mix it but again if yu want em gone no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. In Houston we have fire ants
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. In Houston we have fire ants, fleas, roaches, you name it we have have it. Demon is great for going full scorched Earth on all of them. I hit the outdoor perimeter of the house with this every 3-4 months and it keeps the house bug free.
customer_reviews.author: Ben A.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of three pesticides I rotate through, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of three pesticides I rotate through, and it does what I want it to. I have severe anxiety about roaches in/near the house and this makes them satisfactorily dead.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Darius

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: 04/2020 Update Still no bugs returned!!! Still using the same bottle spraying around the perimeter in and out once a month. ************** This stuff really works! I was moving into a new house that was pretty infested. I bombed twice but there were still large amounts of roaches all sizes. We sprayed this along walls, in cabinets, behind major appliances then outside around the house. That was 4 months ago I did do 1 spot spray in the kitchen in December because I saw one or two but everything is good and I still have a lot of the Demon left.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: I just don't understand those companies who put all kinds of bs on the bottle, but they forget to put the most important and easiest thing, and that is CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS, how the hell do you mix this thing? Make the instructions clear so people know how to mix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Shots anyone???
customer_reviews.text: I swear if they made shot glasses in roach size they would be lining up and want to play quarters with the stuff. I followed directions on first application and didn't see any evidence of it killing and pests, then I mixed it full strength and sprayed it directly on a victim that decided to come out from behind the fridge and it just stopped did some circles and then kept on trucking like it just took a bath in it. Didn't kill a damn roach and if I could I would return it for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Works great, lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent! Bugs come out of all the cracks in your house so I like to leave for a while and then come back ready to vacuum! We live on a wooded lot so lots and lots of bugs. This killed ants, termites, wood roaches, wasps, and all kinds of other bugs I don’t know the names of! Currently testing on ground hornets
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Lueker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We had about 20 wasps flying around our front porch. They never land long enough for me to murder them with the traditional wasp spray so I figured I'd give this stuff a shot. So far after a day, no more wasps at all. No dead bodies either which I guess is fine, but the wasps are gone. We'll see how long this lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It works wonders, haven’t seen mosquitoes or fleas. Normally around this time we have a lot. In one evening my kids would have at least 3 bites on their legs since I’ve sprayed they can be outside all all day with no bites at all. I highly recommend this and already shared with friends and family they also like it. I mix 1 once with a gallon of water covered all around my house and yard (house is about 900 square feet ) I just used pump sprayer from our local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: W.J Cabada

customer_reviews.title: Used to kill fleas over night
customer_reviews.text: Used this for fleas outside in my back yard. Used it 1 time and boom! Fleas are gone. It’s been a few weeks and my 4 dogs don’t have a flea on them. I sprayed at night in the freezing cold and let it dry over night while my dogs stayed inside. Let the dogs out the next morning and they did not have any side affects.
customer_reviews.author: Merrell C

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: We had our home sprayed one time and the guy told us this is what he uses. For almost a year after he sprayed anytime we would have ladybugs or any bug fly into the house if they landed on the walls or wherever it was he sprayed they pretty much would drop dead. We decided to purchase some for ourselves to spray around our home and underneath. I recommend a mask and gloves and if you decide to spray in your home leave it for a few hours to let the smell die down.
customer_reviews.author: Saph&Steph

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and gets the job done✔
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for a couple years now for spiders. Works really really well. It is easy to measure and add to my gallon sprayer. Its so much cheaper than hiring a company to do it. I'm in Southern California and during the warmer weather season spray every 2 weeks. Keeps the spiders and webs at bay. If i don't spray regularly you can tell, there are lots of spiders and webs that form around the outside of our home.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Girl🌼

customer_reviews.title: Puts Ortho to shame...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for me sprayed around the outside of our house using a 2 gallon sprayer, way better than that ortho that stuff its so watered down now save your money and get demon max,we had ants and spiders bad it got rid of them and the mosquitos now it only lasted about month which I wasnt disappointed. I spray once a month anyways..
customer_reviews.author: GSXRKING

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a roach problem in our rental house, I sprayed this twice inside and out and still see a few but not many. Tenants were over run with them when they moved out but this product definitely knocked them down like it states it will. Still having problems getting rid of them completely after using this product twice. I was told to try cynoff wp so that's the next step. This stuff works good, this problem just may be a little to much for it to completely rid the problem with one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: travisjolly

customer_reviews.title: Weekly spraying “some results”
customer_reviews.text: Been spraying weekly doubled dosage and seeing some results but has not killed off cockroaches in my kitchen Will make them run out of crevices Fair warning wear a really good mask 2 weeks in spraying if no results after a month will Give this a 1 star Smells strong as hell though but disappointed after seeing many 5 star reviews unless i have a mutated cockroach population Have not walked in too see dead ones but have seen them scurrying around sluggish Will triple dosage next sunday And this is definitely not a insta kill Product
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Leon

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW!
customer_reviews.text: Turns out I had a roach infestation and I tried everything. I put traps out, I crawled under my house and put the gel bait...the babies kept coming. I bought this and diluted it into a spray bottle and wow. I have noticed a difference. I sprayed my yard, under my house, my attic, and inside the house. If you have animals keep them away until the chemical dried ~ 1hr. Ill have to update you on this in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. We've been using Demon Max regularly for several months now and it has made a very big difference in our home. We've figured out that you have to spray regularly in order for this product to work properly. We're on our second bottle now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this stuff. Works amazing. I bought it this time just as a preventative. The house next door to us is a rental property and there have been some nasty tenants move in and out over the years. After finding this stuff and using it by the directions on the label I have not had a problem since. I recommend this to everyone. In my unprofessional opinion this is the best stuff on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described, make sure you read the directions, wear gloves, PPE, and spray on calm wind days.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff for treating for insects around the house and farm. Just make sure you keep your concentrations to what is instructed so you do not over do it as this stuff is really potent. It works instantly as it says on the bottle for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase overall
customer_reviews.text: Smell is strong but works very well on German roaches. Could never get rid of the nasty filthy bugs without paying arm and leg to exterminator. Took a chance on this stuff. They don’t die immediately but over the month that I’ve had it I’ve spayed once ever couple of days. Ever few days, I come home from work and will see lots dead in corners. Now I hardly see any bugs and those I do find are slow moving and near death
customer_reviews.author: DMGMILLER

customer_reviews.title: Knocks em down - FAST
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I usually use this mixed with a heavier longer lasting insecticide. I have also used this by itself, and it works great. I get a solid 2-3 weeks with no mosquitoes, and it cuts way down on flying insects. I have about 3 acres I need to cover, and it disperses very well. I can notice a difference within an hour of application. For the price, and effect, I think it's a great deal. I apply this with a Stihl backpack engine fogger. (which leaks terribly, I would not buy it again, btw).
customer_reviews.author: reconrover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for Arizona! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase and living in Arizona we deal with black widows, scorpions and roaches in the summer. This does a great job and I use it about every 4-6 months. I have recommended it to friends and family, and have even sent it to family who lives in Hawaii. My husband was so pleased with it that he ordered some for the auto body shop that he runs, after seeing some bugs and spiders taking up refuge, and he said it did an fantastic job, and had no idea how bad the problem was, until he saw dead bugs everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine R Nava

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Leaked During Shipping
customer_reviews.text: I reordered this product this year because it seemed to work well last year for pest control around our home. However, this year the product leaked out during shipping. As you might guess, our postal person was also not pleased. There is no return on this product, but Amazon is processing a credit to our card. I'll follow up if that goes awry. Again, this product does seem to work--shipping seems to be the only hitch.
customer_reviews.author: BPort

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly on mosquitoes. I treated an area near the pool with large windows above and CBS below. This area would attract 30 mosquitoes per day/night throughout the summer. After treatment, not 1 mosquito in the past month. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: B_F

customer_reviews.title: it didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April and gave it to my landlord and I said it didn't work, I tried it in my house and it doesn't work, then I noticed a detail that the expiration date was last year, it was expired. compre esto se lo di ami rentero lo estuvo usando por barios meses y medijo que no funcionaba y cuando mire un detalle estaba espirado en el ano 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Rea

customer_reviews.title: Demon Max, Problem Solved
customer_reviews.text: This product did exactly what I needed it to do. There were water bugs in my basement that I wanted to get rid of and this product delivered. I tried other products from local home improvement stores that did not work. It also worked very fast just followed the easy to understand directions and that was it problem solved. I would definitely recommend this product 100%....
customer_reviews.author: William Pegram

customer_reviews.title: Lost the battle won the War
customer_reviews.text: Fleas, I hate them, found a nest outside and tried everything to get rid of it. It was bleak, I felt like we were losing the fight. And then our secret weapon arrived. Cypermethrin destroyed the fleas. I sprayed twice and 99% died. Will use this only as a final resort, but it was super effective.
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome insecticide
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a monthly pesticide service and canceled it a few years ago. Bought this Demon concentrate and couldn't be happier with it's efficacy. I spray it on ant dens around my yard, and it goes to work. I also use it around my exterior as a preventative. This stuff works great! It's easy to mix and apply with minimal effort. I use a designated pump sprayer and leave unused mix inside the sprayer for months without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Horn

customer_reviews.title: I have not seen any more spiders
customer_reviews.text: I saw a few HUGE spiders in my garage and a friend recommended I order Demon Max. I added it to a spray bottle and sprayed my garage. Honestly, I have not seen a spider since I sprayed. I have seen dead spiders in the garage so I think it is doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: SheIzVerified

customer_reviews.title: Gold standard for spider control
customer_reviews.text: Best insecticide I’ve used. A year later and the results are still amazing. Even better than some professional pest control I’ve hired in the past. If you have an issue with spiders (I did) this is the one for you. Went from barely being able to enjoy my front porch to barely seeing any at all within a week and results holding up a year later.
customer_reviews.author: brightnight

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Used on outside perimeter defense for palmetto bugs which are in abundance in N. GA. Dead, dead, dead! Diluted to directions, sprayed 4 feet up the exterior walls and around 15 feet out.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: WOW...
customer_reviews.text: Suddenly found 3 roaches. We also noticed spiders and stink bugs. Sprayed this around baseboard trim in all rooms and around the parameter outside the house. Within a day, NO BUGS AT ALL...... Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome insecticide !
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Demon Max for three years and love the results of this product, down in Florida we are constantly at war with fire ants and other insects taking over our yards and homes, I wasted thousands of dollars over the years in insect gradual's and other insecticides to battle fire ant's and bugs until someone told me about Demon Max, This is a human and pet safe insecticide that gets the job done inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Think: Apocalypse Now....
customer_reviews.text: I have an old house. In fact, last week it looked like I have decorated for Halloween...in July. I had a wicked widow issue that was going to cost me $300-500 with a monthly maintenance fee of $30. I’m old - I’m poor and how hard could it be? Based on the high reviews - believe it - it’s like I’ve napalmed the area. Nothing but spider carcasses everywhere. House looks like there’s an inhabitant now - instead of some old creepy guy in a haunted house.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Bottle sent not sealed,  leaked!!
customer_reviews.text: 1/4 of the smallest compartment of insecticide leaked in shipping!! Note picture of inside of box. Too expensive for any to be leaked!
customer_reviews.author: Angie J H.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for fleas
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that works! We used Bifen IT and a growth regulator to get rid of fleas and other pests in the yard. Useless. Now I tired this...and boy it worked first time use. We are in south Texas and a huge flea problem. Not anymore with this venom stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Vandy282

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I did some research and found this product a few years ago. I use this to spray around my house, pool and fence and it works fantastically. One of these usually lasts me 2-3 years. I probably spray 2-4 times a year 1-1.5 oz a gallon dilution ratio. Mainly spray in march/April and then again in late may/June after all the bulk of the rain season. Next application will be in mid august and again in October. Love it and would and will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jmat

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product if you want to get rid of pests
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal product and kills literally ALL pests. I even sprayed a frog and killed it. The only thing it has not worked on is a dragonfly that chased me around my yard after I sprayed it with the product. :) I usually spray my entire yard with this about once a quarter. Since I live FL to keep the bugs down I hook it up to my power washer and spray. Make sure you wear a mask and gloves when handling this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I mainly bought this to get rid of small roaches ...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this to get rid of small roaches ... I sprayed twice withing a month. The roaches were reduced but not completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Kaftanovskaia

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Will do the trick! Kills insects very well! My son is as agronomist and this is what he told me to get to control bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Cp

customer_reviews.title: Took care of my paper wasp problem.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hundred paper wasps flying all over the pachysandra surrounding my house. I looked all around my house, but could not find any nests. I sprayed this onto the Pachysandra and to my surprise, the wasps disappeared in two days and did not return. When I cleaned my fireplace this week, I found a huge inactive paper wasp nest under the chimney cap.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: Super effective!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible. We had a terrible ant problem in our front and back yard--at one point, we had 7 ant hills. I applied this stuff to the hills one night, and all of the ants were gone by the next morning. One of the best things about the container is the smaller dispenser off to the side, it's much better than purchasing a measuring cup for chemicals, or eyeballing it and hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: I live in the south and fleas are really bad right now. This product was recommended by friends. After spraying everywhere it has helped some but not completely. I have reapplied once...
customer_reviews.author: Aymi

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Demon Max for years. Had run out and tried store brand spray that connects to the hose, and it did nothing for outdoor ants. Lesson learned, stick to Demon Max. I mix it in a watering can and pour where needed. It lasts a long time, and through heavy rains!
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Death to the black widows!
customer_reviews.text: Paid for a service that came out every 3 months with spiders still viable in the house. We decided to cancel that service and buy this product. We sprayed the around the house and windows very well and have seen nothing but death of the black widows. This is a fantastic product and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on roaches, dosnt instantly kill on contact
customer_reviews.text: I used and even doubled the dosage to get rid of spiders and to repel roaches coming in from my meth head neighbors house. Unfortunately this did not do the trick will probably have to roach bomb the whole place because it’s only getting worse. I’ve sprayed several times the last few months even over did it and I still see them. Gonna be fun tryin to move and not bring these nasty things with me. Do not recommend at all for roaches LIKE AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: joshua l

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The company asked me if I knew if the product was safe for plants. I happily answered yes it is safe when mixed as directed. And I have to tip my hat to the product. Being a user of Dursban 4e, for many years, which was very potent and of course because it worked they took it off the market so I tried my luck at finding a insecticide that would keep my home bug free. And it has. Our new nextdoor neighbor tore walls down and we suddenly were over run with German roaches and it took care of them and has remained roach free. Good stuff. Sincerely Joseph DiJohn
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Best I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by recommendation to kill a flea infestation. Works great on first application but does nothing long term. The quantity goes a long ways and I applied every morning for three days. The fleas are dead and gone all day but a few keep showing up the next morning. Will buy another bottle and keep treating till they are 100% gone. This seems to be the best, I have tried granules, Raid, Adams Flea yard spray, diamatatious earth, Dawn soap and bleach, nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: Gravityrat

customer_reviews.title: Cricket graveyard
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! I didn’t dilute it as much as it instructed. Sprayed the baseboards in the entryway of my condo. There were no survivors. Will definitely purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: So far this product isn't working...
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed at a friend's house for roaches and it didn't seem to kill anything and I followed the label, I'm going to respay his house again and see what happens but so far not good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Handle with care
customer_reviews.text: Use common sense, protect yourself when apply any pesticide or herbicide. Wear a mask, too. These are powerful chemicals and should be handled with respect for yourself and others.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product three years in a row. It works great on mosquito's and other bugs in the yard. I never noticed a Oder and it last for several weeks with the control of mosquitos . I have noticed that the large tree roaches die also and keeps them away for a long time. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Ant man 3
customer_reviews.text: I did not want the next ant man movie taking place in my house, so I bought this because of the reviews it got. I have only sprayed outside as I have toddlers & pets in the house. I did spray twice, with a two week spread, because I was still seeing ants inside and outside. It’s been a week since the second spray and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for spiders and ants!!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great. We were having problems with spiders and carpenter ants in the house and this completely took care of them. The first week noticed less and by the second and third week there were none. Sprayed around foundation and in basement around windows and boxsills. Have found my go-to lifelong product for southern wisconsin bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Befus

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Thus is 1000 times better than any post company does by far. Had a problem with spiders and called a pest control company. I think we had more spiders after they sprayed. Canceled them instantly. And search for pesticides. This one came up as the best, and wow is it ever. Sprayed the perimeter of our house. And spiders where gone! Also about a 3rd of the price of a pest company.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on Fleas
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed this several different ways and it kills nothing. I even sprayed it on a spider and a wasp nest directly and it did not even phase them. I needed it for fleas and it does absolutely nothing to them.
customer_reviews.author: C. John Buchanan Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I recommend using gloves, eye and breathing protection, and immediately wash clothes after spraying this, but this stuff REALLY works for eliminating insects. This is the real product, not the ones sold at home improvement or big box stores. This really works for killing insects, and even can be used for termites. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Y

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Got bit Again!
customer_reviews.text: As the warm weather kicked in, the wife started getting bit by those pesky bugs that make your legs itch from their bites. A friend told me about this product and that it's also good on minimizing Scorpions etc. I purchased it and followed the instructions. YES wear gloves! This stuff works! Follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Grayhawk51

customer_reviews.title: Package leaks
customer_reviews.text: Havent used this yet but not very happy with the way it was delivered, my package was soaked, when I opened the package the lid was not on the product and I lost at least half of my purchase from where it leaked out. The smell is still on my hands just from grabbing package from mail man! I'm hoping what I have left will doing great so we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Works for weeks on end
customer_reviews.text: Used this all around my front yard where i was getting lots of spiders and wasps. Keeps the spiders away and keeps the wasps from making nests by my front door. I sprayed the wasps nest over a couple different days until they all died. So far none have come back.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I live in Houston (nuff said, yes?) but, seriously, bugs here are like your crazy neighbors that pop up at times and places you don’t expect to see them and then, to avoid confrontation, you run back to the house. Anyway, my point is, since using this stuff around the house (and lawn, and fence, and garage), I actually don’t feel scared going outside. I call that a success!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Bug Armageddon
customer_reviews.text: Kills everything it touches. Wasps, yellow jackets, monsterous mounds of ants......none of them stand a chance against this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: Demon Max Insecticide Pint 25.3% Cypermethrin
product_meta.description: Demon MAX has been an industry mainstay with nearly two decades of results. This dual action pre-treatment both kills and repels over 20 pests. In tests, Demon MAX has delivered 90-100% control after 10 years in the soil, even in states with heavy termite pressure.
feature_bullets: Note: The "REL" before the month and year stands for the "release" or production date. This product does not have an expiration, "use by", or stated shelf life. Under normal storage conditions, this product will remain effective for 3 to 5 years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,762 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
